Version 2 is Live!

I am posting this post with the same command as I am releasing version 2 of kortappositioner.se! There are a few small changes and one new feature. Hopefully you will like it.

I already wrote a litte bit about this last weekend but here it comes:

Shorters

It is now possible to see short positions grouped by the entity that has taken them. This might be a way to get a feel for what major players think of areas.

Changes

All charts now contain one datapoint per date within the relevant span. This makes loading a little bit slower but it gives a better perspective and the graphs over stock prices looks more like they do in other places. I have tried to mitigate the extra data amount by making more computations in advance.

Zoomable charts, it is now possible to zoom in all charts if you only are intrested in a subset of the dates.

Automatically updated data, now there is a heroku instance automatically updateing the data. Hopefully you wonÂ´t notice this change but I think it will make the service a little bit more reliable.

More information

If you are intressted the entire change set is available github.
